name.ch: 網路與資料庫程式設計

department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch: 培養學生網路與資料庫之程式設計能力
goal.en: Developing students‘ programming skills in networking and databases.

outline.ch:
Basics of Python (lists, tuple, set, dictionary, read ＆ write files, Object-oriented programming)
Database SQLite
GUI with wxPython
Database MySQL
Database Mongo DB
Web development with Python and Django
Web development with Python and Flask
Web scraping with Python
Python and machine learning (decision tree)
Python and machine learning (clustering)
Python and machine learning (Yolo)
Python and machine learning (GPT)
outline.en:
Basics of Python (lists, tuple, set, dictionary, read ＆ write files, Object-oriented programming)
Database SQLite
GUI with wxPython
Database MySQL
Database Mongo DB
Web development with Python and Django
Web development with Python and Flask
Web scraping with Python
Python and machine learning (decision tree)
Python and machine learning (clustering)
Python and machine learning (Yolo)
Python and machine learning (GPT)

gradMethod.ch:
Group hands-on assignment 55％
Mini-project 1: 20％ 
Mini-project 2: 20％ 
Participation: 5％
gradMethod.en:
Group hands-on assignment 55％
Mini-project 1: 20％ 
Mini-project 2: 20％ 
Participation: 5％

domain.ch: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群
domain.en: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群

ch.competencies: 分析及處理問題的能力
溝通協調與團隊合作能力
國際視野與終身學習的能力。

en.competencies: System Analysis and Solve the Problem

ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限資訊電機學院學士班。
en: Department:Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.
